thread.title: Get ready to #RockTheDots for Minnie Mouse on National Polka Dot Day, January 22
thread.title_full: Get ready to #RockTheDots for Minnie Mouse on National Polka Dot Day, January 22

author: Darcy Clark
title: Get ready to #RockTheDots for Minnie Mouse on National Polka Dot Day, January 22
text:
Calling all fashionistas! Sunday, January 22, 2017 is National Polka Dot Day, the perfect excuse to celebrate Minnie’s impact on fashion and popular culture. Disney Springs at Walt Disney World Resort and Downtown Disney District at Disneyland Resort will honor the signature style of global icon, Minnie Mouse, and you’re invited to join the polka-dotted, mouse-eared fun.

Visit Disney Springs or Downtown Disney District on January 22 dressed in your polka-dotted finest to join the celebrations – including special photo opportunities, entertainment, a commemorative button, discounts and giveaways. (I’m planning to rock a pair of my sparkliest Minnie ears, too … I’ve got three pairs because they totally complete the look!)
Stay tuned to the Disney Parks Blog for more details on how you can #RockTheDots in the coming weeks; we’ll also be sharing information via @DisneySprings and @DisneylandDTD on Twitter so follow us there for real-time updates.
